name: Lou Grant
overview: The trials of a former television station manager turned newspaper city editor, and his journalist staff.

episodes.name: Sports
episodes.overview: The paper faces a public backlash after Lou runs a story about an NCAA investigation into the possible recruiting violations by a popular local college football team.

episodes.name: Dying
episodes.overview: Art Donovan's mother is dying, but he is having trouble accepting this as fact. His relations with everyone in the newsroom suffer as his mother gets worse, and his colleagues try to help him come to terms with the inevitable.

episodes.name: Hometown
episodes.overview: When Lou goes back to his elderly home to settle his aunt's estate, he meets an old flame and gets his first story assignment in years from Charlie.
